name: C h a i n - R e a c t i o n
name_original: C h a i n - R e a c t i o n
description:
| C h a i n - R e a c t i o n |  2021 GMTK Game Jam entry

Link yourself and your orb buddies together to win in this challenging puzzle game! [ARROW] or [WASD] keys to move. Other instructions are in game.

If the browser build is taking too long, you can download the HTML below.

All code, graphics, and music were made during the jam by me, @xamuil2
